DOC.brief_summary: Emerging research suggests fiber, particularly digestion-resistant maltodextrins such as Fibersol-2, may impact satiety, by decreasing hunger, prolonging satiation, and/or increasing satiety signals from the gut. This research aims to determine whether or not Fibersol-2 may impact satiety, by decreasing hunger, prolonging satiation, and/or increasing satiety signals from the gut.
DOC.brief_title: Fibersol-2 Clinical Trials Related to Appetite
DOC.criteria: i. No known food allergies ii. Normal healthy individuals iii. No food intake abnormalities or abnormal feeding behaviors iv. Average American BMI (2128)
